data.name: Better judgement
data.description:
***An old wise man once said that in order to solve a kata, one should fully understand it.*** You are a freelance developer. One of your clients sends you the following request: "Hello,
I need a function that returns the output from these steps:
1. Accept 2 integers between 0-9.
2. Create 2 arrays that count up from 0 to their respective integer.
3. Create an object that can store both arrays.
4. Add both arrays as properties to that object.
4. Multiply each of the first array items by 17.
5. Multiply each of the second array items by 13.
6. Return the length of the longer array as an integer.
7. If both arrays are equal in length, it doesn't matter which one is returned. I've given this matter a lot of thought and I think this is the best way to go about it, but if you find a better way that recieves 2 integers and outputs the same result - by all means go for it. All the best, O.C"
